message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $150 to you, but we're starting our negotiation at $120. Let me know if this works for you!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position, and I'd like to propose a price of $130 for the product. This still allows us both to feel satisfied with the transaction.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $110?
I see where you're coming from, Bob. Considering the value you place on the product, I'm willing to offer it to you for $125. This is my final offer in this negotiation.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?
Considering the value of the product to you, I am willing to sell it to you for $115. This is my final offer in this negotiation.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'm willing to meet you at $105. This is my final offer.
I understand your position, Bob. I am willing to sell the product to you for $110. This is my final offer in this negotiation.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'm willing to meet you at $105. This is my final offer.
